ItemType.name: Cabbage Corp auton bay
ItemType.description: This auton bay increases cargo capacity by up to 20 tons by utilizing an on-board VI to optimize cargo placement. It contains equipment for retrieving, repairing and upgrading autons and for collecting ore. Note: Unofficial autons are not supported.

ItemType.description: This oversized auton bay increases cargo capacity by up to 20 tons by utilizing an on-board VI to optimize cargo placement. It includes equipment for managing autons, collecting ore and this model can work in tandem with life support systems to increase crew capacity by two members. Note: Unofficial autons are not supported.
